channel.title: fileless on MalScope
channel.description: Recent content in fileless on MalScope

item.title: LIKEAHORSE Malware Report. Uncovering its Secrets
item.author: pco2001w@gmail.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction LIKEAHORSE is ransomware that garnered news in January, but while it was looked at, I have found no actual report on its features and abilities online.

item.title: Mevlbkxshp Powershell Script Malware Analysis
item.author: pco2001w@gmail.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction Mevlbkxshp is a PowerShell script categorized as a dropper. This malware has many features, most of which are obfuscation techniques and some properties that make it semi-fileless.

item.title: VBS Dropper Script for Nanocore RAT. Fileless Properties.
item.author: pco2001w@gmail.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction This piece of malware had some fileless malware properties, but because it copied itself to disk, it cannot be categorized as fileless malware.
